name: Rhizobiome
description:
Fungi are part of the underground microbiome. They interact with a broad spectrum of other organisms. They can obtain nutrients from the soil, from plant roots and  from other  microorganisms .

In Rhizobiome, the player decide the fungus fate, growing,  exploring the soil for more and more nutrients. He will meet other inhabitants  and engage either antagonist, neutral or beneficial interactions.

Result project of the Scientific Game Jam 2019 in Toulouse, France.
